question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/oracle/sources/oracle_pro.move] [Function: get_price_from_adaptor()] [Unsafe Price Retrieval] Line 178 calls get_price_unsafe_to_target_decimal() - function name suggests unsafe operation - what safety checks are missing? (High)
